titles.title: Congratulating Messiah College men's and women's soccer teams on winning the 2009 NCAA Division III national championships.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.
Ms. Woolsey moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 1030.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

committee.subcommittee: Higher Education, Lifelong Learning, and Competitiveness
committee.name: House Education and Labor

bill.summary: 1/26/2010--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates Messiah College men's and women's soccer teams on winning the 2009 NCAA Division III national championships.
